analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x8d3ae193f3d30c2d48ed6d8b8af8537a3eaf4680.sol:
	Contract Papino has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x8d3ae193f3d30c2d48ed6d8b8af8537a3eaf4680.sol#180-181)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x8d3ae193f3d30c2d48ed6d8b8af8537a3eaf4680.sol#65-67) is not in mixedCase
